briefdescription.para: Main driver class for TLE92466ED Six-Channel Low-Side Solenoid Driver IC.

detaileddescription.para:
AI Generated Driver
2025-10-20
2.0.0
Comprehensive C++23 driver for the Infineon TLE92466ED IC. This driver provides a complete, feature-rich interface to all capabilities of the IC including:

listitem.para: Current range: 0-2A register scale (1.5A typical continuous) single channel 0-4A register scale (2.7A typical continuous) parallel mode
PWM frequency control for current regulation
ICC Mode: Integrated Current Control with precise regulation

simplesect.para: This is free and unencumbered software released into the public domain.
